bug.short_desc: kgb-bot-1.31-8.fc25 FTBFS: t/52-client-git.t test fails: refusing to merge unrelated histories
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
kgb-bot-1.31-8.fc25 fails to build in F25 because a test fails:
t/51-client_branch_module.t .... ok fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories merge allnew: command returned error: 128 # Looks like your test exited with 128 just after 68. t/52-client-git.t .............. Dubious, test returned 128 (wstat 32768, 0x8000) All 68 subtests passed [...] Test Summary Report ------------------- t/52-client-git.t (Wstat: 32768 Tests: 68 Failed: 0) Non-zero exit status: 128
A difference between working and failing build root is:
perl-open 1.10-364.fc25 > 1.10-365.fc25 perl-Test-Simple 1.302022-1.fc25 > 1.302026-1.fc25 perl-Memoize 1.03-364.fc25 > 1.03-365.fc25 git-core 2.8.4-1.fc25 > 2.9.0-1.fc25 coreutils 8.25-5.fc25 > 8.25-6.fc25 perl 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 perl-IO 1.36-364.fc25 > 1.36-365.fc25 perl-libs 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 perl-Errno 1.25-364.fc25 > 1.25-365.fc25 coreutils-common 8.25-5.fc25 > 8.25-6.fc25 perl-devel 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 pcre 8.39-0.1.RC1.fc25 > 8.39-1.fc25 perl-SelfLoader 1.23-364.fc25 > 1.23-365.fc25 mesa-libGL 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 perl-Math-Complex 1.59-364.fc25 > 1.59-365.fc25 mesa-libEGL 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 kernel-headers 4.7.0-0.rc2.git3.2.... > 4.7.0-0.rc3.git0.1.... mesa-libglapi 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25 shadow-utils 2:4.2.1-10.fc25 > 2:4.2.1-11.fc25 perl-macros 4:5.24.0-364.fc25 > 4:5.24.0-365.fc25 mesa-libgbm 12.0.0-0.1.rc1.fc25 > 12.0.0-0.2.rc2.fc25
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.
kgb-bot-1.31-9.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-6f804d1f38

kgb-bot-1.31-9.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-6f804d1f38
kgb-bot-1.31-9.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
